content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Transfer System at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (52.0, -82.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (53.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (52.5, -79.5) transferring coal from the Wooden Chest at position (53.5, -80.5) to another Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -78.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (52.5, -76.5) waiting for source items from the Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -77.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing System at position (-12.0, -51.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-12.0, -51.0) dropping iron ore into a Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) receiving iron ore from the Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-11.5, -48.5) waiting for source items from the Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-8.5, -48.5) waiting for source items
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -46.5) waiting for source items from the Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available for the inserters to pick up. Check for any blockages or missing items in the supply chain to avoid idle inserters.

### Chest Full Warning
- Regularly empty the chest at position (-11.5, -49.5) to prevent the mining drill from stopping due to a full chest.

### Furnace No Ingredients Warning
- Ensure that the stone furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) is consistently supplied with iron ore to maintain production of iron plates.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the provided logs.

### Important Variables
- `wooden-chest`: int (3)
- `wood`: int (10)
- `coal`: int (755)
- `iron-ore`: int (859)
- `iron-plate`: int (965)
